title: Age of Empires 2 HD: The Forgotten v 4.3.1 + Workshop
description:
Hello this is Age of Empires 2 HD: The Forgotten v 4.3.1 with some Workshop items

After I cound find this version of the game with items I like I bought it and made this torrent to thank all the people I downloaded from!

Thanx for downloading =)

***Please seed this game as much as possible!!!
***I might stop seeding any time - sorry.

Rip info:
-Complete copy of game wich I bought on steam(so if you have any issueses to run it please visit steam forums) 
-Includes Steam Emulator to run the game
-Language EnglishRussian

-Workshop items:
> AI from LÐ¾gÐ’ot, Ð’arÐ’ariÐ°n, RÐµssonÐ°nceÐ’Ð¾Ð¢
> Enchenced farms
> Enchenced sinking ships
> Blood (units leave blood when killed)
> Flames from Aoe2
> Terrain (changes only sand and some grass), possible to substitute with originals from prev versions

Requirments:
-Installed distributives VC++ 2012, 2013, 2015
-Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8
-Proc 1,2 GHz
-RAM 1 Gb
-HDD 4,2 Gb
-Installed 7z archivator program

Installation and running:
-Etract files to any place
-Log off from Steam if running
-To launch game please use AoK HD_Loader.exe (please note that it starts the game in 5-10 seconds and also it is creating files like AoK HD.exe.5012.STEAMSTART that you can delete later on)

Additional info:
-I made original executable files hidden to avoid accidental running them instead of AoK HD_Loader.exe, cose in the case your Steam will auto run
-To change player name please open SmartSteamEmu.ini find PersonaName = 
-To change language please open SmartSteamEmu.ini find Language = 
-I dont know if multiplayer works but please try it out with Hamachi or alike
